title: leonair
author: leonair
content: The Muslim holy month of Ramadan will begin from March. Â So from now the raw materials required for the month of Ramadan are being imported in the market. Â I went to a raw market in my town yesterday and saw every bag of chickpeas printed with bitcoin gold. I was surprised to see that in my country so far the cryptocurrency government is not fully legalized. There's Bitcoin Gold printed on the sacks of chickpea bag. I understand that these products are imported from abroad. And I'm just thinking about how the name of Bitcoin Â is spreading globally. What do you think about it?

comments.author: Jawhead999
comments.body: Bitcoin Gold and Bitcoin are different coins! Bitcoin Gold is a Bitcoin fork, as you can read it on their official site https://bitcoingold.org/It's misleading if you think the company in your country are want to spread a real Bitcoin globally, since they're promoting for Bitcoin Gold. It's either they got tricked and think Bitcoin Gold is a real Bitcoin or they have a purpose to promote Bitcoin Gold.

comments.author: kro55
comments.body: Quote from: Jawhead999 on February 01, 2023, 04:30:44 AMBitcoin Gold and Bitcoin are different coins! Bitcoin Gold is a Bitcoin fork, as you can read it on their official site https://bitcoingold.org/It's misleading if you think the company in your country are want to spread a real Bitcoin globally, since they're promoting for Bitcoin Gold. It's either they got tricked and think Bitcoin Gold is a real Bitcoin or they have a purpose to promote Bitcoin Gold.Thanks for the useful information, this is also the first time I know about bitcoin Gold's existence, I'm like OP, I think they do it to promote bitcoin, not bitcoin gold. But with this way of advertising, I think it is more beneficial for bitcoin than their product because I believe many people will not know about bitcoin Gold but only bitcoin. Today, I think the name bitcoin will not be unfamiliar to everyone, where there is the internet and smartphone, there is also bitcoin. But the problem is people still don't understand what it is because of some barriers created by the government.

comments.author: UchihaSarada
comments.body: Bitcoin is a digital gold but it is not Bitcoin Gold.If you are the producer printed those bags, you can order the printer to print it is "Bitcoin is a digital gold"The current label Bitcoin Gold is a free advertisement for Bitcoin Gold, not for Bitcoin.If you print Bitcoin Diamond, you are shilling for Bitcoin Diamond, not for Bitcoin.How Many Bitcoin Forks Are There?

comments.author: LDL
comments.body: After the discovery of bitcoin, few people in the world knew about science, but with the evolution of civilization and the return of time, people in different countries of the world not only know about this digital currency but also started to use the digital currency bitcoin widely. Â However, there can be a lot of criticism about how the knowledge of Bitcoin has been spread around, through various news media, television, radio, YouTube, magazines, above all through various blogs and writings. Â Currently, people from different countries have created different products on Bitcoin and spread it to different countries of the world. Bitcoin logo designed chocolates are available in our country. Moreover, Bitcoin logo is designed on t-shirt jerseys in our country. Bitcoin ChocolateBitcoin T-shirtNB:Images from Google are used for illustration/ examples purposes only.

comments.author: leonair
comments.body: Quote from: Jawhead999 on February 01, 2023, 04:30:44 AMBitcoin Gold and Bitcoin are different coins! I know bitcoin and bitcoin gold is different coin. But it is uses a fork of Bitcoin. And it has Bitcoin compatibility. this name is Bitcoin Gold but it is also advertising Bitcoin name also.Quote from: kro55 on February 01, 2023, 04:50:37 AMQuote from: Jawhead999 on February 01, 2023, 04:30:44 AMBitcoin Gold and Bitcoin are different coins! Bitcoin Gold is a Bitcoin fork, as you can read it on their official site https://bitcoingold.org/It's misleading if you think the company in your country are want to spread a real Bitcoin globally, since they're promoting for Bitcoin Gold. It's either they got tricked and think Bitcoin Gold is a real Bitcoin or they have a purpose to promote Bitcoin Gold.Thanks for the useful information, this is also the first time I know about bitcoin Gold's existence, I'm like OP, I think they do it to promote bitcoin, not bitcoin gold. But with this way of advertising, I think it is more beneficial for bitcoin than their product because I believe many people will not know about bitcoin Gold but only bitcoin. Must of the people know about bitcoin and bitcoin gold. I am not mention here btc and btcg is same lolQuote from: LDL on February 01, 2023, 05:46:10 AMhttps://i.imgur.com/utqM754.jpg Bitcoin Chocolatehttps://i.imgur.com/6JfvJDY.jpgBitcoin T-shirtNB:Images from Google are used for illustration/ examples purposes only.Google has a huge amount of bitcoin content that has been done with Photoshop or Illustrator. Â It is never used in real life. Â Your comment is completely baseless lol

comments.author: Aanuoluwatofunmi
comments.body: This is something now common and no more a news seeing bitcoin branded materials in their varieties on display, it's what someone like you and i can also decide to make a brand with bitcoin or it's logo on shirts, cars, house and other valuable materials and equipments just to join in marketing bitcoin to others like in our homes, office or the society we lived in, which is your own personal quota or way of encouraging for adoption.

comments.author: Maus0728
comments.body: What I think is wrong with this kind of promotion is that it gives newbies a notion that a bitcoin copy cat is a worthy investment. And that as long as there is a "bitcoin" in its name, the asset is equally comparable to the original bitcoin which in the long run is a bad idea especially when they start investing their money.

comments.author: Kemarit
comments.body: LOL, I thought it was BTC, but thanks it was BTG.So it's a big surprised the BTG was able to be promoted like this? or it is just the people behind the bag of chickpeas supported it? makes me wonder.Or maybe it's kinda misleading as well for those who are buying and thinking that this is BTC?

comments.author: coinerer
comments.body: This is bitcoin gold which is cryptocurrency related true but it doesn't promote bitcoin at all it only promotes bitcoin gold but since the word bitcoin is associated with this name maybe it can also promote bitcoin to some extent. However, it is very appreciable to see that cryptocurrency is spreading globally which will bring a positive side to the entire crypto industry including Bitcoin. that's it

comments.author: xSkylarx
comments.body: I've searched about agri products of Bitcoin Gold, but I haven't found any. The bitcoin gold that was in the agri products is, I think, a form of advertisement since I also found this kind of agri product posted on Reddit. Also, this is not Bitcoin; it is another form of coin. I thought it was really Bitcoin, but I don't see any logo of Bitcoin, and it has gold on it. Though it is my first time to hear this and also my first time to hear this kind of advertisement that was really written on the sack of the product just to spread awareness.

comments.author: Z390
comments.body: Actually Bitcoin Gold is different from the real Bitcoin but it should help, the curiosity will kick in and some people will want to know what that's all about, it's same thing with Bitcoin cash and doing research on these forks will still lead to the main champ ( BTC ). Â I believe that this promotion is directly from the BTG team, I wish something like this can be done for Bitcoin but that's left for the adopters, Bitcoin Gold has a visible team compare to the untouchable Bitcoin.

comments.author: jrrsparkles
comments.body: I doubt it has nothing to do with bitcoin gold as well which is entirely different from bitcoin while I was thinking someone who heard about the popularity of bitcoin and decided to use the name so people may get attention to it so its simply a marketing strategy sketched by someone to make some money.

comments.author: ultrloa
comments.body: Quote from: Jawhead999 on February 01, 2023, 04:30:44 AMBitcoin Gold and Bitcoin are different coins! Bitcoin Gold is a Bitcoin fork, as you can read it on their official site https://bitcoingold.org/It's misleading if you think the company in your country are want to spread a real Bitcoin globally, since they're promoting for Bitcoin Gold. It's either they got tricked and think Bitcoin Gold is a real Bitcoin or they have a purpose to promote Bitcoin Gold.That information might mislead newbie then invest their money on bitcoin gold instead the real bitcoin so maybe those people around there who knows the real bitcoin should clarify this that bitcoin gold and bitcoin is different coin so that there information receive is accurate and they will not expect any huge to a wrong coin. This is not how to spread bitcoin because bitcoin itself is not been on the pic so I guess it was made to promote the other coin which people need to look closely.

comments.author: Questat
comments.body: Well, this could possibly confuse the mind of people, especially those who really never know Bitcoin. They might think that Bitcoin Gold is also Bitcoin. Nothing benefits from it aside from getting confused and rises questions about the real Bitcoin. But as we know, Bitcoin is already been known globally and if we talk about cryptocurrency, Bitcoin is at the top of our minds. Besides, spreading the name of Bitcoin is easier if we use social media platforms and I see it was more influential way than doing what OP has shown to us.

comments.author: TastyChillySauce00
comments.body: It must come from a company that is affiliated with bitcoin gold lol. Bitcoin gold was a scam coin created by scammers to imitate bitcoin. it's a failed coin. even though if it was mentioning name of bitcoin but it doesn't mean newbies can know which is true or fake bitcoin. Newbie shall do some research before. That bag of chickpeas was fooling people. it must be a part of marketing trick that ran by hang yin. lol

comments.author: Yogee
comments.body: I find this really funny regardless if the text written in the bag is bitcoin or bitcoin gold. You can also say it is spreading globally but for the wrong reasons in some countries. I mean yes any form of marketing can be good but other gullible people may think it's a brand of chickpeas rather than a cryptocurrency hehe.

comments.author: blockman
comments.body: I was happy when I saw the name but after reading the entire thing, there's gold on it. Well, then that's the altcoin, the fork of bitcoin that's dedicated to CSW.But looking at the positive perspective and it's just bitcoin alone, whatever is the product and whoever manufactured those sacks, putting bitcoin on its name is creative. We all have an idea that whoever came up with that name and idea is surely a bitcoin investor or btg whatever it is, they surely are part of the crypto community.

comments.author: uneng
comments.body: That is the brand of the chickpeas used by the businessman behind it. Probably he discovered bitcoin online and created his own brand using its name and logo. I found another similar product, which must belong to the same business company:https://saraswatitraders.com/brandsProbably it's a marketing strategy to captivate bitcoin enthusiasts to becomes their customers, due to the sympathy they have for bitcoin's aesthetics.
